title: Drawing, "Sketches.  Study.  Landscapes.  Ships.", 1850–51
inscribed:
Recto:  Inscribed in graphite with figures at top right:  Just after Sunset / 4 and 9 same cloud / 5 Gostly cool cloud light / 3 warm shadow indistinct / 4 similar to 2 only darker / 5 lights rich orange / 6 cloud  (struck out  "mixed") blended / into 7 green open sky / 8 open sky / 9 warmest lights and shadows / 10 Dark shadow; and again at bottom right: over.

Verso:  Inscribed in graphite at bottom right: over
description:
Recto: Vertical views with a beached row boat seen from the bow and a sailing ship at top with a cloudy sky over wooded ridges at center.
Verso: In opposite direction showing an oblique view of a mountainous shore seen horizontally and three views of a sailing ship.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Sketches.  Study.  Landscapes.  Ships.", 1850–51. Graphite on cream-colored paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-30.
